Seller
Hi, I'm Garret Friesen, a 34-year-old entrepreneur from Canada. With a passion for AI and social media, I specialize in developing custom AI bots using ChatGPT 3.5, 4.0, and GPT-4. As a Botpress Ambassador, I create advanced customer service bots that integrate seamlessly with various systems to collect data, process payments, provide suggestions, and display media. Additionally, I offer services in social media management and workflow automation to help businesses streamline their operations. Let's collaborate to bring your ideas to life and boost your business with cutting-edge AI solutions.

Crypto Bot

  • Featured Bot Skills

Our Crypto Bot integrates advanced trading strategies developed on TradingView, rigorously back-tested for optimal performance. Once validated, these strategies trigger alerts seamlessly integrated into our Botpress AI workflow. This AI-driven system executes and monitors trades autonomously, providing an additional layer of security and precision to cryptocurrency trading. By leveraging cutting-edge technology, our Crypto Bot empowers traders with reliable, data-driven decision-making capabilities, ensuring strategic advantage in dynamic crypto markets.

SportGPT

  • Featured Bot Skills

Meet our SportGPT bot, your ultimate companion for sports betting intelligence. Harnessing team matchup statistics, team performance metrics, and standings data, our bot meticulously analyzes disparities to pinpoint strategic advantages between competing teams. Armed with cutting-edge predictive capabilities, our bot forecasts match outcomes with up to 100% accuracy at times during the season. Empowering you with unmatched insights, our SportGPT bot revolutionizes your betting strategy, ensuring informed decisions and maximizing parlay bet success.
